name: Proposal Generation
description: Generate well-structured governance proposals with rationale and implementation plans

context.description: Context and requirements for the proposal

estimated_impact.description: Estimated impact on system and stakeholders

claude_prompt: Generate a comprehensive governance proposal based on the provided context. Include: clear problem statement, proposed solution, rationale, implementation plan, timeline, budget (if applicable), risk assessment, and success criteria. Format for on-chain submission. Use clear, persuasive language appropriate for the target audience.

context.rationale: Increase validator decentralization by lowering barrier to entry

proposal.title: Reduce Minimum Staking Amount to 500 ETR
proposal.problem_statement: Current 1000 ETR minimum excludes smaller holders from staking
proposal.solution: Reduce minimum to 500 ETR to increase participation
proposal.timeline: Implement in next runtime upgrade (est. 14 days)

output.summary: This proposal recommends reducing the minimum staking amount from 1000 to 500 ETR...
implementation_plan: Update runtime parameter via democracy pallet

risks: Increased validator set size may impact performance
